metadata.title: Wednesday, 20th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the African Swine Fever broke out in Lusaka Province as reported in the media;
(b)    what the population of pigs in the Province is and how many pig farms have so far been affected;
(c)    what the symptoms of the disease are;
(d)    what measures the Government has taken to control the disease;
(e)    what the effects of the disease on the piggery industry in Zambia are; and
(f)    whether the affected farmers will be compensated to help them restock the pigs.
(a)    when construction of staff houses at the new One Stop Border Post in Katima Mulilo will commence;
(b)    when the Border Post will be fenced to improve security; and

(c)    when the remaining works at the Border Post will be completed. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 27/01: under consideration): (Prof Lungwangwa). Heads 27/02, 27/03, 27/04, 27/05, 27/06, 46/01, 46/02, 46/05, 46/06, 46/07, 46/08, 46/09, 46/10, 46/11, 46/12, 46/13, 46/14, 46/15, 46/16, 46/17, 46/18, 46/19, 21/01, 37/01, 37/02, 37/04, 37/06, 37/07, 37/08, 37/09, 37/10, 37/11, 37/12, 37/13, 37/14, 20/04, 20/06, 20/09, 29/01, 29/03, 29/04, 29/05, 29/06, 29/07, 29/09 and 25/01 - for consideration.
